mapper.select: SELECT s1.staff_fldid,s1.staff_fldpersoncode,s1.staff_fldpersonname,s1.staff_fldpersongender,decode(s2.dict_fldname,'1','无',s2.dict_fldname) AS staff_flddeptname,decode(s3.dict_fldname,'0','无',s3.dict_fldname) AS staff_flddutyname ,s1.staff_fldbuild,s1.staff_fldroomcode,s1.staff_fldbednum,s1.staff_fldwardrobenum,s1.staff_flddesknum,s1.staff_fldshopboxnum,s1.staff_fldlivingdate as staff_fldlivingdate,s1.staff_fldcontent,s1.staff_fldexchangedate FROM ssh_staffinfo s1 LEFT JOIN sys_dict s2 ON s1.staff_flddept = s2.dict_fldid LEFT JOIN sys_dict s3 ON s1.staff_fldduty = s3.dict_fldid WHERE s1.staff_fldflag = 0 order by s1.staff_fldbuild,s1.staff_fldroomcode

SELECT s1.staff_fldid,s1.staff_fldpersoncode,s1.staff_fldpersonname,s1.staff_fldpersongender,decode(s2.dict_fldname,'1','无',s2.dict_fldname) AS staff_flddeptname,decode(s3.dict_fldname,'0','无',s3.dict_fldname) AS staff_flddutyname ,s1.staff_fldbuild,s1.staff_fldroomcode,s1.staff_fldbednum,s1.staff_fldwardrobenum,s1.staff_flddesknum,s1.staff_fldshopboxnum,s1.staff_fldlivingdate,s1.staff_fldcontent FROM ssh_staffinfo s1 LEFT JOIN sys_dict s2 ON s1.staff_flddept = s2.dict_fldid LEFT JOIN sys_dict s3 ON s1.staff_fldduty = s3.dict_fldid WHERE s1.staff_fldflag = 0 and s1.staff_fldpersoncode = #{param}
select * from ssh_roomset where roomset_fldbuildname = #{param1} order by roomset_fldroomcode
select * from ssh_roomset where roomset_fldroomcode=#{param1} and roomset_fldbuildname=#{param2} order by roomset_fldroomcode

SELECT s.staff_fldbuild,s.staff_fldroomcode,s.staff_fldpersonname,s.staff_fldbednum,s.staff_fldwardrobenum,s.staff_flddesknum,s.staff_fldshopboxnum ,s1.dict_fldname as staff_flddeptname,s2.dict_fldname as staff_flddutyname FROM ssh_staffinfo s left join sys_dict s1 on s.staff_flddept = s1.dict_fldid left join sys_dict s2 on s.staff_fldduty = s2.dict_fldid WHERE staff_fldbuild=#{param1} AND staff_fldroomcode =#{param2} and staff_fldflag=0 order by s.staff_fldbednum

SELECT s1.staff_fldid,s1.staff_fldpersoncode,s1.staff_fldpersonname,s1.staff_fldpersongender,decode(s2.dict_fldname,'1','无',s2.dict_fldname) AS staff_flddeptname,decode(s3.dict_fldname,'0','无',s3.dict_fldname) AS staff_flddutyname ,s1.staff_fldbuild,s1.staff_fldroomcode,s1.staff_fldbednum,s1.staff_fldwardrobenum,s1.staff_flddesknum,s1.staff_fldshopboxnum,s1.staff_fldlivingdate as staff_fldlivingdate,s1.staff_fldcheckoutdate,s1.staff_fldcontent,s1.staff_fldexchangedate FROM ssh_staffinfo s1 LEFT JOIN sys_dict s2 ON s1.staff_flddept = s2.dict_fldid LEFT JOIN sys_dict s3 ON s1.staff_fldduty = s3.dict_fldid WHERE s1.staff_fldflag = 1 order by s1.staff_fldbuild,s1.staff_fldroomcode

SELECT s1.staff_fldid,s1.staff_fldpersoncode,s1.staff_fldpersonname,s1.staff_fldpersongender,decode(s2.dict_fldname,'1','无',s2.dict_fldname) AS staff_flddeptname,decode(s3.dict_fldname,'0','无',s3.dict_fldname) AS staff_flddutyname ,s1.staff_fldbuild,s1.staff_fldroomcode,s1.staff_fldbednum,s1.staff_fldwardrobenum,s1.staff_flddesknum,s1.staff_fldshopboxnum,s1.staff_fldlivingdate as staff_fldlivingdate,s1.staff_fldcheckoutdate,s1.staff_fldcontent FROM ssh_staffinfo s1 LEFT JOIN sys_dict s2 ON s1.staff_flddept = s2.dict_fldid LEFT JOIN sys_dict s3 ON s1.staff_fldduty = s3.dict_fldid WHERE s1.staff_fldflag = 1 order by s1.staff_fldbuild,s1.staff_fldroomcode

SELECT t1.roomgoods_fldbuildname,t1.roomgoods_fldroomcode,t1.roomgoods_fldbednum,t1.roomgoods_fldwardrobenum,t1.roomgoods_flddesknum, t2.staff_fldshopboxnum,t2.staff_fldpersoncode,t2.staff_fldpersonname,t2.staff_fldpersongender FROM ssh_roomgoods t1 LEFT JOIN ssh_staffinfo t2 ON t1.roomgoods_fldbuildname = t2.staff_fldbuild AND t1.roomgoods_fldroomcode = t2.staff_fldroomcode AND t1.roomgoods_fldbednum=t2.staff_fldbednum AND t2.staff_fldflag = 0 WHERE t2.staff_fldpersoncode IS NULL and t1.roomgoods_fldbuildname=#{param1} and t1.roomgoods_fldroomcode = #{param2} order by t1.roomgoods_fldbednum
